responses.gpt4: Good morning, Patient. This is Rachel, your AI nurse from O'Connor Hospital. I'm calling in regard to your upcoming colonoscopy procedure on August 13th at 9:00 AM. I was hoping to chat with you for a few minutes about your procedure and answer any questions you might have. Is this a good time for us to talk? If I may ask, how has your day been so far?
responses.our_model: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Shizu Kageyama?
